plrgb1: Set line color by 8-bit RGB values

plrgb1 (r, g, b);

Set line color by 8-bit RGB values. Do not use this. Only retained for backward compatibility. Use the function plscol0 instead.

r (PLINT, input)

NEEDS DOCUMENTATION

g (PLINT, input)

NEEDS DOCUMENTATION

b (PLINT, input)

NEEDS DOCUMENTATION
